scripts.build-check-watch: chokidar "src/*.rs" "src/**/*.rs" -c "(cargo rustc --lib --features check -- -Z no-trans && cargo rustc --bin envars --features check -- -Z no-trans); echo ----------"
scripts.watch: chokidar "src/*.rs" "src/**/*.rs" -c "(cargo rustc --lib --features check -- -Z no-trans && cargo rustc --bin envars --features check -- -Z no-trans); echo ----------"
